channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My IRA and personal trading account had the biggest one-day gain ever. What will tomorrow bring?
item.description: “My personal trading account was also up 18% in one day.”

item.title: I begged my adviser to sell amid the market turmoil. He dragged his feet and I lost $20,000. Do I have any recourse?
item.description: “If he had moved my money out of the market weeks ago, much of my loss could have been prevented.”

item.title: Tesla earnings could offer hope for the stock. But this has to happen first.
item.description: The EV company’s investors want reassurance on sales and future projects such as robotaxis and a cheaper vehicle.

item.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter my life savings, but her partner is unemployed and doesn’t pay rent. What do I do?
item.description: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment.”

item.title: Overly bearish investors risk writing off 2025 too soon. These strategies offer upside and downside protection.
item.description: Ed Yardeni argues that, to match the doom and gloom from Wall Street bears, the stock market would need to see a Lehman-esque meltdown.

item.title: Netflix gets price target increases from several Wall Street shops after earnings beat
item.description: Several analysts raised their price target on Netflix after its first-quarter earnings beat.

item.title: Tesla gets a price target cut from Barclays ahead of earnings this week
item.description: "The set-up for Tesla into 1Q EPS is confusing," said analyst Dan Levy.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts like these dividend-paying energy stocks
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including Energy Transfer and Diamondback Energy.

item.title: Bernstein predicts which Chinese stocks can survive delisting and tariff worries
item.description: Bernstein is looking at Chinese internet tech stocks like it's the downtrodden days of Covid-19.

item.title: Tariff negotiations may bring unseen risks to individual stocks
item.description: Nvidia's drop last week is an example of how the still-developing trade situation can deliver bad news for key stocks.

item.title: Bill Ackman’s Short Squeeze: A Wild Ride for Hertz Global Holdings Inc.
item.description: As we head into the weekend, one stock has emerged as a surprise winner in recent trading: Hertz Global Holdings Inc. (HTZ). The rental car company’s ...
